data.title: Roma Termini → Grosseto by Train from €9.90
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Roma Termini to Grosseto in 1h 38m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Roma Termini to Grosseto today.
data.text:
Thinking about taking the train from Roma Termini to Grosseto? We’ve got you covered.

It usually takes around 2 hours 1 minute to travel the 93 miles (150 km) from Roma Termini to Grosseto by train, although you can get there in as little as 1 hour 38 minutes on the fastest services. You’ll normally find around 20 trains per day running on this route. You won’t need to worry about making any changes along the way either as direct trains are available. You can travel on this route with either Frecciabianca and Trenitalia trains. Both train companies run modern comfortable services with plenty of room for luggage.

Train tickets from Roma Termini to Grosseto start from €9.90 when you book in advance, which can be cheaper than buying them on the day. Start a search in our Journey Planner to check out the latest prices.

Keen to book your train tickets to Grosseto? No need to wait, start a search with us today! If you want to find out a bit more about the journey first, you can find our train timetable below, tips on booking cheap tickets and our FAQs, including first and last train times.
